author: Isobel Asher Hamilton
title: Billionaire Jeff Bezos says he spoke directly to WHO and hinted Amazon might deliver COVID-19 test kits globally
description: Jeff Bezos posted a picture to Instagram of himself having a video-call with the Director General of WHO to discuss the coronavirus outbreak. Bezos said Amazon is already supporting WHO with IT support and providing AI to help its epidemic-mapping tools. "We …
content:
Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos posted to Instagram on Thursday to say he'd held a video call with the director-general of the World Health Organisation (WHO), Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus.
In his post, Bezos listed the ways Amazon is mobilizing to help WHO in its respo… [+1954 chars]
